entry.g:description:
Sateen sheets are 100% 300-thread count Pima cotton and have a subtle stipple effect on the body and an attached hem that simulates the top-of -the-bed patchwork.
Care: Machine Wash Cold Material: 100% Cotton Sateen, 300 TC Pocket Size; 16"
